text: 9|83|to (he nabee!) yadi aapako allaah in (dvidhaavaadiyon) ke kisee giroh ke paas (tabook se) vaapas laaye aur ve aapase (kisee doosare yudhd mein) nikalane kee anumati maangen, to aap kah den ki tum mere saath kabhee na nikaloge aur na mere saath kisee shatru se yudhd kar sakoge. tum pratham baar baithe rahane par prasann the, to ababhee peechhe rahane vaalon ke saath baithe raho.
